snippet: The police said an off-duty correction officer shot Jeffrey Ragland, 50, once in the chest, following a dispute involving a woman, who is also a correction officer.
abstract: New York City Police Dept officials report that Jeffrey Ragland, retired New York City Correction Department officer, was shot and killed by another correction officer in Queens after an off-duty dispute involving a woman, who was also a correction officer; no charges have been filed.
lead_paragraph: The police said an off-duty correction officer shot Jeffrey Ragland, 50, once in the chest, following a dispute involving a woman, who is also a correction officer.

headline.main: Retired Correction Officer’s Death May Have Stemmed From a Romantic Quarrel
headline.print_headline: Retired Correction Officer’s Death May Have Stemmed From a Romantic Quarrel
